duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement Actimize SAM 8.x or 9.x solutions and develop custom models using stored procedures, rule cloning, policy manager, and query rules.
Install and confirm Actimize Case Management system and AIS/RCM components.
Understand AML transaction monitoring solution and rules/scenarios.
Write complex SQL queries, joins, and stored procedures.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
